channel.title: vuejs on Zeeshan Khan
channel.description: Recent content in vuejs on Zeeshan Khan

item.title: Vuejs SEO without ssr using nginx
item.description: Vuejs was easy to get started with, so I picked it up for my new project idea was to finally compile into a single page application, completely static I was happy with the result, but SEO and link sharing was not working as expected, since all the dynamic data was pulled after but soon SEO became the requirement SSR was too much rework looked for alternative Nuxt was there but again that meant lot of rework and re-structuring then I thought why to filter the traffic from bots (mainly the platforms where the links were going to be shared) created a small flask app to handle that traffic and return proper meta tags added nginx config to send traffic to flask app based on user agents and voila!
